articles.description: After spending Rs 36,915 crore to acquire a majority equity stake in the company, ONGC has to toil through paperwork to get its sole nominee director appointed on the board of HPCL.
articles.content:
After spending Rs 36,915 crore to acquire a majority equity stake in the company, ONGC has to toil through paperwork to get its sole nominee director appointed on the board of HPCL.

articles.title: VPNs: Why they matter and what’s changing - Economic Times
articles.description: The government wants VPN providers to strictly follow new cybersecurity rules, resulting in them expressing doubts about continuing to operate in India. We explain what a VPN is, why it is important and what the controversy is all about.
